body: A spellcaster with a spell component pouch is assumed to have all the material components and focuses needed for spellcasting, except for those components that have a specific cost, divine focuses, and focuses that wouldn't fit in a pouch.
name: Spell Component Pouch
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Equipment/Goods And Services/Tools and Skill Kits/Spell Component Pouch
